#summary Introduction to ImageListView
#labels Phase-Design,Featured

= Introduction =

!ImageListView is a .NET control for displaying a list of image files. It looks and operates similar to the standard !ListView control. Image thumbnails are loaded asynchronously with a separate background thread. 

!ImageListView version 7 requires the .NET framework 2.0 or [MonoSupport Mono 2.6].
!ImageListView version 8 requires .NET framework 3.0 to take advantage of the Windows Imaging Component.

= Features =
  * Asynchronously loaded image thumbnails
  * [ImageListViewRenderer Custom renderers]
  * [ViewModes Thumbnails, Gallery, Pane and Details view modes]
  * Ability to extract embedded thumbnails
  * Drag&drop support
  * Works with .NET 2.0 and [MonoSupport Mono 2.6]
